critique: This document pertains to the temporary withdrawal of land in Arizona for classification purposes, under the authority of an act of Congress from 1910. It does not express a clear ideological tilt, immigration stance, or directly address executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion.
